title: Reform UK's Zia Yusuf calls Nathan Gill 'ancient history'
description: The party's head of policy says he has never met Nathan Gill, who served as the leader of Reform UK in Wales in 2021.
content:
Reform UK head of policy Zia Yusuf has described Nathan Gill, the disgraced former leader of the party in Wales, as "ancient history".
Gill received a 10-and-a-half year sentence on 21 November after admitting to taking around £40,000 in bribes for p... [2769 chars]

title: Newcastle attempted murder investigation sees eight men arrested
description: A woman is in a critical condition in hospital after the attack in Elswick, Northumbria police say.
content:
Eight people have been arrested after an attack which left two people in their 60s with serious injuries.
Police were called to a property on Durham Street in Elswick, Newcastle, at about 18:45 GMT on Friday after a man and woman had been assaulted.

title: Police name woman who died in Swindon as murder inquiry continues
description: Sarah Forrester, 55, was found unresponsive at a home in Moredon, with a 13-year-old girl arrested and later bailed
content:
Police have named a woman whose death has sparked a murder investigation.
Sarah Forrester, 55, a mental health counsellor, died after an incident at a house in Moredon, Swindon, on Friday evening.
A 13-year-old girl arrested on suspicion of murder ha... [2047 chars]

title: Tributes paid to mental health charity worker - as girl, 13, arrested on suspicion of Swindon murder bailed
description: Sarah Forrester, who was in her 50s, was described as an "incredible person" after she was pronounced dead in Swindon on Friday evening.
content:
A woman who died in Swindon has been remembered as an "incredible person" and "caring" colleague - as a 13-year-old girl arrested on suspicion of murder was bailed.

title: Primal Scream pay tribute to late bassist Mani at Manchester Warehouse Project gig
description: Primal Scream paid tribute to their late bassist Gary ‘Mani’ Mounfield during their Manchester show last night (November 22).
content:
